name: Towel Trip
description:
"A towel, it says, is about the most massively useful thing an interstellar hitchhiker can have."

                                                                    ― Douglas Adams, The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

 

            Hello, brave hitchhiker! Imagine, you are in the open space, in search of your TOWEL. Or, erm… it is in search of you... However.

 

            Towel trip – is a maze puzzle game, developed by team of enthusiasts within the Epic MegaJam 2018 competition. Help poor towel to find it’s owner, guiding it through all the obstacles. But remember… reality is often inaccurate… Don’t follow the lights.

Single Player game

Genre - Puzzle

Platform - PC (Windows)

Gameplay Controls:

WASD  - Move

Mouse Axis  - Rotate Camera

Q - Rotate sphere left

E - Rotate sphere  right

TAB - Help

ESC - Exit

Team members:

Aleksandra Petrova (@Petra) - visual design

Konstantin Lysenko (@Koss) - 3d modelling

Igor Kondratiev (@Igor) - programming

Nikita Uginchus (@Ugi) - game design
